subject: JUnit 4 & Eclipse & BeforeClass
msgSnippet: Hello, I want to do perform action once for a testing process (db connection and so on). So all my test classes derive from an abstract HibernateTest class
messageBody:
Hello,
I want to do perform action once for a testing process (db connection and so
on). So all my test classes derive from an abstract HibernateTest class with
the proper @BeforeClass method. BUT, in Eclipse, when I try the "Junit ->
run all tests in the directory", @BeforeClass is being run for each test
class (which could be justified, if Eclipse runs each TestClass
independently). I tried to write a TestSuite containig all the Test cases,
but then I receive the "No tests found with test runner "JUnit4"".

How to ensure a method is called once for a testing process?
--
